p: The final type of empirical networks are so called proximity networks. In these, a link represent a pair of people being close to each other at some time. These data sets all come from the Sociopatterns project (sociopatterns.org) and were collected by radio-frequency identification sensors given to people in some specific social setting. Such sensors record a contact if two persons are within 1â€“1.5 m. The social setting of one of these data sets is a conference [ 30] ( Conference), another is a hospital [ 31] ( Hospital) and the final one is from a school ( School 1 and 2) [ 32].
